name: ISEKAI QUEST! v2
description:
You were summoned to Harem World, full of Anime Girls.
You can seduce any girls you want to, but it comes at a price.
Can you complete the quest and save the world?

*Playing in a Full-screen mode is highly recommended,
by clicking the button in the bottom right.

Controls :
Mouse

* We updated to version 2.0!! including :
- One more character is playable
- Whole new dialogues
- New interactions, expressions
- Sexy mini-game for clear reward
- And much more!
Try it now!
